title: Chinpokomon
description: The popular Japanese toys come to life! The inexplicable adventures of Furrycat, Donkeytron, Pengin, Shoe, and Lambtor. Collect them all, and you can become Royal Crown Chinpoko Master.
quote: Someday, I will collect all the Chinpokomon, then I will fight the Evil Power that will reveal itself once all the Chinpokomon are collectable!
